{"id":950695330,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1684143611,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"53 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/950695330/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Prefix Common Array of Two Arrays","memory":"83.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> findThePrefixCommonArray(vector<int>& A, vector<int>& B) {\n        int n=A.size(),common=0;\n        vector<int> C;\n        unordered_map<int,int> freq;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            freq[A[i]]++;\n            freq[B[i]]++;\n            if(freq[A[i]]==2 || freq[B[i]]==2)\n            common=(freq[A[i]]==freq[B[i]] && A[i]!=B[i])?common+2:common+1;\n            C.push_back(common);\n        }\n        return(C);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-prefix-common-array-of-two-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
